name: post-getNotificationConfigurationList
description: Returns the details of the configurations of all of the notification subscriptions in the platform of the executing user.

$ul: **configurations**: Details of the notification subscription configurations.
**pspReference**: The reference of a request. Can be used to uniquely identify the request.
